custom_fields.label: Approval Status

Pending
Approved
Recommended by the Line Manager
Rejected by the Line Manager
Rejected

Rejected by the Head of Department

custom_fields.depends_on: eval: doc.leave_type == "Study Leaves" || doc.leave_type == "Marriage Leave" || doc.leave_type == "Hajj Leave" || doc.leave_type == "Umrah Leave"
custom_fields.label: Attachments

custom_fields.name: Leave Application-custom_attachments

custom_fields.depends_on: eval: doc.leave_type == "Official Duty (In-Station)" || doc.leave_type == "Official Duty (Out-Station)" || doc.leave_type == "Half Day Leave" || doc.leave_type == "Short Leave"
